Package graphicslib3D

Interface Summary
IQuarterPatch This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "QuarterPatchDialog" class.
ISurfacePatch This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "SurfacePatchDialog" class.
 

Class Summary
BezierPoint This class is a helper class supporting the SurfacePatchDialog; it is not intended to be used directly.
CameraSettingsDialog This class provides a graphical component for keeping track of camera setting values (location, look-at point, and up-direction) interactively.
ControlMesh This class defines a 4x4 array of "control points" -- Point3D objects which represent the control points for a cubic Bezier surface.
GLSLUtils This class defines a set of static utility methods useful when manipulating GLSL shader programs in a JOGL OpenGL environment, including routines to read shader source from a file, fetch and print shader and shader program information logs, and check for OpenGL errors.
Polygon3D Defines a 3D polygon which includes a Vertex list and Plane Coefficients.
QuarterPatchDialog This class is an editor which provides a graphical interface for making changes to the properties of IQuarterPatch objects -- i.e., any object which implements the "IQuarterPatch" interface.
QuarterPatchDialogPanel This helper class implements the visual functionality of the QuarterPatchDialog class by providing mouse listeners, painting algorithms, and methods to manually move a point via scrollbars or textboxes.
QuarterPatchLimitsDialog This helper class provides a dialog for updating point limits in swept QuarterPatches being edited with a QuarterPatchDialog.
Shape3D Defines the abstract base class from which all 3D shapes are derived.
SurfacePatchDialog This class is an editor which provides a graphical interface for making changes to the properties of ISurfacePatch objects -- i.e., any object which implements the "ISurfacePatch" interface.
SurfacePatchDialogPanel This helper class implements the visual functionality of the SurfacePatchDialog class by providing mouse listeners, painting algorithms, and methods to manually move a point via scrollbars or textboxes.
SurfacePatchLimitsDialog This helper class provides a dialog for updating point limits in SurfacePatches being edited by a SurfacePatchDialog editor.
